abstract: Japanese officials report that computers in Parliament have been infected with a virus, latest in a series of cyberattacks that have raised concerns about sensitive government materials being leaked.
snippet: The episode is the latest in a series of mysterious cyberattacks that have raised concerns about the leakage of sensitive information.
lead_paragraph: The episode is the latest in a series of mysterious cyberattacks that have raised concerns about the leakage of sensitive information.

headline.main: Virus Infects Computers in Japan’s Parliament
headline.seo: Virus Infects Computers in Japan’s Parliament
